Class TileSets

java.lang.Object
org.example.galaxy_trucker.Model.Tiles.TileSets
public class TileSets extends Object
The TileSets class manages two sets of tiles: covered tiles and uncovered tiles. It provides methods to access, add, and manipulate these sets, while enabling listener-based notifications when changes occur in the tile sets. This class is thread-safe for operations on the covered and uncovered tile sets.

  • Constructor Details

    • TileSets

      public TileSets(GAGen gag)
      Initializes a new instance of the TileSets class. This constructor sets up the covered tiles by utilizing the TileListToSet method from the GAGen object, and initializes an empty list for uncovered tiles.
      Parameters:
      gag - an instance of GAGen used to retrieve the list of tiles and convert them into a set for the covered tiles.

  • Method Details

    • getNewTile

      public Tile getNewTile()
      Retrieves a random Tile object from the set of covered tiles, removes it from the set, and notifies listeners about the change in the covered tile set.
      Returns:
      a randomly selected Tile object from the set of covered tiles.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the set of covered tiles is empty.

    • getNewTile

      public Tile getNewTile(int index)
      Retrieves and removes a tile from the list of uncovered tiles at the specified index. Notifies listeners about the change in the tile set.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the tile in the uncovered tiles list to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the tile at the specified index, or null if the index is out of bounds

    • AddUncoveredTile

      public void AddUncoveredTile(Tile tile) throws RemoteException
      Adds a tile to the collection of uncovered tiles if it is not already present. Notifies all registered listeners about the change in the uncovered tile set.
      Parameters:
      tile - The tile to be added to the collection of uncovered tiles.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a communication-specific error occurs.

    • setListeners

      public void setListeners(TileSestListener listener)
      Registers a new TileSestListener to the list of listeners. This listener will be notified of changes or updates in the tile set.
      Parameters:
      listener - the TileSestListener to be added to the list of listeners

    • removeListeners

      public void removeListeners(TileSestListener listener)
      Removes a specified listener from the collection of registered TileSestListener objects. Once removed, the listener will no longer receive notifications for tile set changes.
      Parameters:
      listener - the TileSestListener to be removed from the list of listeners

    • getUncoveredTiles

      public ArrayList<Tile> getUncoveredTiles()
      Retrieves the list of uncovered tiles.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing the uncovered tiles.
